description: Non-material amendment to planning permission dated 25/09/2024  ref 2022/4356 ( Demolition of the existing building and erection of a part-single, part-three storey building to provide a community centre at ground floor level (Class F), and 8 x studio and 1 x 1-bed flats above (Class C3), with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage.) to allow reduction of number of apartments from 9 to 7; changes to windows to sides and rear; privacy screens shown to rear balconies and reduction of height and depth of proposed rear hall.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed: A1063-PL006 Location Plan and Site Plan Oct 2024; A1063 -PL120 Proposed Ground Floor Plan Oct 2024; A1063 - PL121 Proposed First & Second Floor Plans Oct 2024; A1063 -PL123 Proposed Roof Plan Oct 2024; A1063 -PL150 Proposed Elevations Oct 2024; A1063 -PL152 Retreat Meeting Room Elevations Oct 2024; A1063 -PL305 Section 01 and Section 02 - Community Building Oct 2024; A1063 -PL611 Proposed Landscaping Strategy Oct 2024; Design and Access Statement October 2024; Consultation with Neighbours December 2024 Rev A; 02-09 (25 Degree Analysis) dated 27/01/23: 22187_F Rev B (Topographical Survey); Arboricultural Report (prepared by ACS Trees Consulting, dated 30/07/2022); Accessibility Report (prepared by Kilo, dated 18/08/2022); BREEAM Assessment, Scoring and Reporting Tool - Likely and Optimistic Outcomes; Daylight and Sunlight Report (prepared by Waldrams, dated 19/10/2022); Design and Access Statement (Rev C prepared by Kilo, dated September 2022); Drainage Strategy (prepared by Edge Structures, dated August 2022); Energy Statement (prepared by the Monalco Partnership LLP, dated 30/09/2022); Fire Safety Strategy (Rev 2, prepared by Nadim Choudhary, dated 14/09/2022); Flood Risk Assessment (prepared by UK Flood Risk, dated 14/07/2022); Heritage Statement and Condition Survey (prepared by Cox Consultancy, dated 23/10/2022); Housing Report (prepared by Agence, dated 14/10/2022); Noise Impact Assessment Report (prepared by KP Acoustics, dated 08/02/2022); Planning Statement (prepared by Agence, dated 17/10/2022); Preliminary Bat Roost Assessment (Rev A, prepared by Middlemarch, dated 03/01/2023); Preliminary Ecological Appraisal (prepared by Middlemarch, dated September 2022); Public Consultation Report (prepared by Kilo, dated 08/09/2022); Response to Daylight and Sunlight Objection (letter, prepared by Kilo dated 14/02/2023); Transport Statement (prepared by TTP Co

Condition : 2 - INFORMATIVE: You are advised that the s.106 planning obligation associated with Ref.2022/4356 dated 25/09/2024 requires a deed of variation prior to commencement of the permission in oder to update the obligations relating to affordable housing and the reduced number of units from 9 to 7.
